column4: Can someone help me? It's a sound issue. Onboard nf3 sound on 32bit Ubuntu w/ Feisty. http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=3030313#post3030313

i hate to tell you this, but sound is a black art. it may be that your soundcard is new, in that case i would try several "Live CD" distros untill you find one that can sing... then you can investigate which linux driver and how they set it up
that mobo looks too new for me to even help you
dont underestimate the power of the live disk... try several knoppixes and several others too
